name: Qi EUROPE
goal:
Qi EUROPE (www.qieurope.com) is a Spanish R & D company, formed by economists, engineers and lawyers with more than 20 years of experience, dedicated since 2012 to the analysis and selection of emerging technologies for its strategic preparation (models of business, technological-financial valuation and investment analysis) and business development for its introduction in international markets, through public and private international financing activities, corporate finance, international business development and venture capital.
The team has more than 20 years of experience advising large companies, SMEs, technology centers and universities in the sectors of energy, transport, health, environment and since 2016 in ICT (Information and Communication Technologies), Security and Defense.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
New business models, technology valuation in Energy, transport, health, environment and since 2016 in ICT (Information and Communication Technologies), Security and Defense.
Policies and legislative files related with impact, business, investment, standardization and markets outlook.
